actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide that after January 1, 1975, Memorial Day be observed on May 30 of each year and Veterans Day be observed on the 11th of November of each year.

summary.text: Provides that Memorial Day shall be observed on May 30 of each year and Veterans Day shall be observed on the 11th of November of each year as a legal public holiday.

titles.title: A bill to provide that after January 1, 1975, Memorial Day be observed on May 30 of each year and Veterans Day be observed on the 11th of November of each year.
